Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 61st overall pick, by Pontiac in 1972...
Earned first career win on 5/29/1980...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/5/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $2,488,888 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 5/19/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $616,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/6/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $1,322,500 per year...
Had first career hit on 6/6/1987, off George Vice (GHG)...
Injured on 10/10/1988 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
